requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack while you have a face-up Level 7 or higher WIND Attribute Warrior or Beast Type monster on your field.

effect.en: Change the attacking monster to face-up Defense Position. Then, if your LP are less than or equal to your opponent's, you can destroy 1 Attack Position monster on your opponent's field. Then, inflict damage to your opponent equal to [the original ATK of the monster destroyed by this effect].
